alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:43AM MST until January 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Locally higher snowfall amounts up to 8 inches are expected in the southwestern portion of the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes, Friday night. Travel in the backcountry is not advised.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
